0111111001110110 1101100010110010 1 -> sum: 0101011100101001, cout: 1
1001001110111100 0010001110110011 1 -> sum: 1011011101110000, cout: 0
1111110010000101 1001010010100111 1 -> sum: 1001000100101101, cout: 1
1101011000000011 1010101101100110 1 -> sum: 1000000101101010, cout: 1
1011110001100010 1110001011000111 0 -> sum: 1001111100101001, cout: 1
1010111000010011 1010110111100001 0 -> sum: 0101101111110100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
